Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2013 12:14PM bojoi7 wrote: Keepthefaith, luckily was very busy after the biopsy because my father in law came for a visit. Yeah, I am praying that it will be benign. I hope yours will be benign as well. Thank you for the prayers.
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy and Nurse Told it Doesn't look good bojoi7 ballet12

Posts.Content: bojoi7 wrote: Hi everyone! On Monday I had a core biopsy for a suspicious mass with shadowing and undefined margin. The doctor told me a lot of things about my mass and he said that even biopsy result will be benign they will do another biopsy or surgery to make sure they did not miss anything. I asked him if he thinks its malignant, he said there is a chance that it is and because of my age ( I'm 29 ), he thinks it might be benign. But after the biopsy, the nurse told me that it doesn't look good and hoped that everything will be fine. She even told me to bring my husband when I'll get my result. I am very very scared not of dying but from the possibility that I won't see my 6 month old daughter grow. She needs me and I cant stop crying thinking of her. Pls pray for me and my family! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy and Nurse Told it Doesn't look good bojoi7 ballet12

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2013 12:19PM bojoi7 wrote: Lastar and dogsandjogs, I was even wondering why the nurse was telling me those things. I wasn't really that scared at first but when she told me that it doesn't look good, I just burst out in tears. The first thing on my mind was my daughter. But I am still hoping and praying that it will be benign.
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy and Nurse Told it Doesn't look good bojoi7 ballet12

Posts.Content: Sep 21, 2013 11:54AM bojoi7 wrote: Hi everyone! Just got the result of my biopsy and it's benign. The doctor said what they saw is just normal breast tissue. But they recommend that I will have another ultrasound after 6 months. I am so relieved and thankful to God! Thanks for the prayers, btw.
